articles.description: Follow live coverage from day five of the World Athletics Championships in Budapest.
articles.title: Watch: World Athletics day five - GB's Payne in hammer throw qualifying

articles.description: Watch live coverage and follow text and radio commentary as Manchester Originals host Southern Brave in the 2023 Men's Hundred.
articles.title: Manchester Originals v Southern Brave - watch, listen & follow text

articles.description: Britain's Josh Kerr stuns Olympic champion Jakob Ingebrigtsen to win 1500m gold at the World Championships in Budapest.
articles.title: Kerr stuns Ingebrigtsen to take world gold

articles.description: Ollie Watkins' devastating hat-trick helps ruthless Aston Villa mark their return to European football with a first-leg Europa Conference League play-off demolition of Hibernian.
articles.title: Watkins nets hat-trick as Villa hit Hibs for five

articles.description: Controversial incidents distracted from women’s historic achievements on the pitch during the Women’s World Cup.
articles.title: Three controversial moments of the Women's World Cup

articles.description: Owen Farrell missing the first two games of the World Cup is "not the end of the world" for England, says Matt Dawson.
articles.title: Farrell ban not end of the world for England - Dawson

articles.description: Watch the moment Great Britain's Josh Kerr holds off a challenge from favourite Jakob Ingebrigtsen to win gold in the world 1500m final.
articles.title: 'Lightning strikes twice!' - GB's Kerr wins 1500m gold

articles.description: Southern Brave's victory over Manchester Originals sees them finish top of The Hundred table and reach their third successive final.
articles.title: Brave thrash Originals to reach Hundred final

articles.description: Rory McIlroy says the absence of LIV players from Team Europe will have no bearing on their chances of reclaiming the Ryder Cup.
articles.title: No LIV players won't hurt Ryder Cup bid - McIlroy

articles.description: Nottingham Forest sign defender Gonzalo Montiel on a season-long loan from Sevilla with an option to make the move permanent.
articles.title: Forest sign World Cup winner Montiel on loan
